document.full_text: belgians molested by catholic priests will go ahead with their legal proceedings against the vatican for damages despite an offer by local bishops to compensate them, their lawyers said on wednesday.
document.title: belgian abuse victims to file suit against vatican
lines_and_colors: belgians molested by catholic priests will go ahead with their legal proceedings against the vatican for damages despite an offer by local bishops to compensate them, their lawyers said on wednesday.
